Title: The Batman Superman Movie: World's Finest
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Alan Burnett (story "World's Finest"), Paul Dini (story "World's Finest"), Stan Berkowitz (screenplay "World's Finest,  Part III"), Alan Burnett (screenplay "World's Finest,  Part I"), Paul Dini (screenplay "World's Finest,  Part I"), Rich Fogel (screenplay "World's Finest,  Part I"), Steve Gerber (screenplay "World's Finest,  Part II"), Jerry Siegel (character created by: Superman), Joe Shuster (character created by: Superman), Bob Kane (creator: Batman)
Actors: Tim Daly, Dana Delany, Kevin Conroy, Mark Hamill
Plot: Joker goes to Metropolis with an offer and plan to kill Superman for Lex Luthor while Batman pursues the clown to Superman's turf.
